text: Nijinsky is a 1980 American biographical drama movie directed by Herbert Ross and starring Alan Bates, Leslie Browne, George de la Peña, Carla Fracci, Ronald Pickup, Ronald Lacey, Vernon Dobtcheff, Frederick Jaeger, Jeremy Irons, Siân Phillips. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1980 drama movies Category:1980s biographical movies Category:1980 LGBT movies Category:American biographical movies Category:American drama movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Herbert Ross
title: Nijinsky (movie)
